comments:
RC1

Sorry I couldn't find a shorter set of steps:

- retrieve the org.eclipse.swt project from dev.eclipse.org
- in the Navigator select the project's .classpath_gtk file, right-click -> Copy
- select the org.eclipse.swt project, right-click -> Paste
- in the rename dialog enter (no quotes) ".classpath" --> builds swt
- go to Window -> Preferences
- press the Import button at the bottom, and import the preferences file that
will be attached in the next comment
- shut down eclipse and restart
- open the org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Color class in the java editor
- put the cursor at the end of line 14 and press Return
- collapse the expansion of the Color class (now appears on line 32)
- right-click in the editor -> Revert File
- _immediately_ (ie.- while it's still reverting) close the editor with the 'X'
decoration on the tab at the bottom
- will get the following exception
